formattedAddress: 231 W 96th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 231 W 96th St, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I can’t fathom a better bike shop. I found an excellent selection of super high quality bikes and rode off into the sunset with a slick new ride tricked out with useful accoutrements. The staff is stellar, especially Lou Jacob.

text.text: I can’t fathom a better bike shop. I found an excellent selection of super high quality bikes and rode off into the sunset with a slick new ride tricked out with useful accoutrements. The staff is stellar, especially Lou Jacob.

originalText.text: Love it here! I walked in with a newly purchased used bike in need of some TLC. Everyone here was so nice and very attentive! I will certainly return and avail myself of their expertise and products in the future. It was nice to feel taken care of in a busy world! The shop is nicely appointed and full of nice merchandise and accessories. Trek is AWESOME! Thanks!

text.text: Love it here! I walked in with a newly purchased used bike in need of some TLC. Everyone here was so nice and very attentive! I will certainly return and avail myself of their expertise and products in the future. It was nice to feel taken care of in a busy world! The shop is nicely appointed and full of nice merchandise and accessories. Trek is AWESOME! Thanks!

originalText.text: The service manager, who assisted me, Forest, was really wonderful. It has been a long time since I had my old Trek bike serviced. Forest reviewed with me the most urgent adjustments and replacements and gave me a timeline for future needs. I appreciated the patience and time spent as I pondered over the cost/benefit of what I needed to do. When I picked up my bicycle, it rode beautifully! So happy with the work done!

text.text: The service manager, who assisted me, Forest, was really wonderful. It has been a long time since I had my old Trek bike serviced. Forest reviewed with me the most urgent adjustments and replacements and gave me a timeline for future needs. I appreciated the patience and time spent as I pondered over the cost/benefit of what I needed to do. When I picked up my bicycle, it rode beautifully! So happy with the work done!

originalText.text: Anthony and his team are great. I needed some pedals and there was a mix up and I received the wrong ones. He reordered them for me and installed a temporary pair until the ones I needed arrived. I watched him and his team interact and service families and others as I waited. Having worked in retail I know there are many times when it sucks but these guys are great. Corporate, give them all a raise!

originalText.text:
This store/location is fantastic.  Not only does it have a great map point in terms of a locally available bike store close to major transportation, but it's always busy, never crowded, and has a massive showroom with excellent bicycles and accessories.

I think the staff is even better than all those reasons; I bought my bicycle from this store over three years ago and have amazing customer service experiences every time I visit.   Everyone I have interacted with has been exceptionally kind, patient, and generous.  It's a very high-quality experience.  I recommend this location to anyone considering their cycling needs and desire for an excellent shopping experience.

You can really tell that the staff cares about your experience and enjoys their work.
